statements: SELECT * FROM solo_travelers WHERE traveler_id = 1;
SELECT traveler_name, travel_destination FROM solo_travelers WHERE travel_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM solo_travelers WHERE travel_destination = 'Paris' ORDER BY travel_date DESC;
SELECT traveler_id, traveler_name, booking_details FROM solo_travelers WHERE traveler_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT traveler_name, travel_date FROM solo_travelers WHERE travel_date BETWEEN '2022-06-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT traveler_name, travel_destination, travel_date FROM solo_travelers WHERE traveler_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM solo_travelers WHERE travel_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY traveler_name DESC;
SELECT traveler_id, traveler_name, travel_destination FROM solo_travelers WHERE travel_destination LIKE 'Europe%' ORDER BY travel_date ASC;
SELECT traveler_name, travel_date, booking_details FROM solo_travelers WHERE booking_details IS NOT NULL AND booking_details <> '' ORDER BY traveler_name ASC, travel_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT travel_destination FROM solo_travelers WHERE traveler_name IN ('Alice', 'Bob', 'Charlie') ORDER BY travel_destination ASC;
SELECT * FROM solo_travelers WHERE name = 'Alice';
SELECT id, name, email FROM solo_travelers WHERE id = 2;
SELECT id, destination, start_date, end_date FROM travel_itineraries WHERE traveler_id = 3;
SELECT name, phone FROM solo_travelers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT destination FROM travel_itineraries WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM solo_travelers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email, phone FROM solo_travelers WHERE id = 2 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT traveler_id, destination FROM travel_itineraries WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT name, email FROM solo_travelers WHERE phone LIKE '%123%' AND name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM travel_itineraries WHERE destination = 'Paris' ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM itinerary;
SELECT destination, arrival_date FROM itinerary ORDER BY departure_date DESC;
SELECT traveler_name, email FROM solo_travelers WHERE nationality = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM bookings WHERE booking_type = 'Hotel' ORDER BY booking_date ASC;
SELECT destination, arrival_date, departure_date FROM itinerary WHERE arrival_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM bookings WHERE booking_type = 'Flight' AND booking_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT itinerary.destination, bookings.booking_type FROM itinerary JOIN bookings ON itinerary.id = bookings.itinerary_id WHERE itinerary.arrival_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT itinerary.destination, solo_travelers.traveler_name FROM itinerary JOIN solo_travelers ON itinerary.id = solo_travelers.id WHERE solo_travelers.nationality = 'USA';
SELECT bookings.booking_date, bookings.booking_type, itinerary.destination FROM bookings JOIN itinerary ON bookings.itinerary_id = itinerary.id ORDER BY bookings.booking_date DESC;

SELECT itinerary.destination, bookings.booking_type, solo_travelers.traveler_name FROM itinerary JOIN bookings ON itinerary.id = bookings.itinerary_id JOIN solo_travelers ON bookings.itinerary_id = solo_travelers.id WHERE bookings.booking_type = 'Hotel' AND solo_travelers.nationality != 'Canada';
SELECT * FROM itinerary ORDER BY start_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, destination, start_date FROM itinerary WHERE destination = 'Paris';
SELECT booking_id, booking_date FROM bookings WHERE booking_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT traveler_id, first_name, last_name FROM solo_travelers WHERE email = 'example@email.com';
SELECT payment_id, amount, payment_date FROM payments ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM itinerary WHERE destination = 'Paris'
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM solo_travelers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com'
SELECT itinerary_id, booking_date FROM bookings ORDER BY booking_date DESC
SELECT id, destination, start_date, end_date FROM itinerary WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY payment_date ASC
SELECT * FROM itinerary;
SELECT destination, start_date, end_date FROM itinerary ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM bookings WHERE booking_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT accommodation_id, accommodation_type, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM accommodations WHERE accommodation_type = 'Hotel';
SELECT activity_name, activity_date, notes FROM activities WHERE activity_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM itinerary ORDER BY start_date ASC, end_date DESC
SELECT destination, start_date, end_date FROM itinerary WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31'
SELECT accommodation_type, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM accommodations WHERE accommodation_type IN ('Hotel', 'Resort') ORDER BY check_in_date DESC
SELECT flight_number, departure_date, arrival_date FROM flights WHERE arrival_date > '2022-06-30' ORDER BY departure_date ASC
SELECT activity_name, activity_date, notes FROM activities WHERE activity_date = '2022-08-15'
